description: Schema definition for velero helm chart values

configuration.description: Configuration of the global properties for velero component

volumeSnapshotLocation.description: Defining the properties for the volume Snapshot Location.

name.description: Specifies the name of the cloud provider used to store volume snapshots, such as aws, gcp, or azure.

bucket.description: Specifies the name of the storage bucket where volume snapshots are uploaded.

region.description: Provides the region in which the bucket is created. It only applies to AWS. See the full list of AWS regions.

apiTimeout.description: Defines the amount of time after which an API request returns a timeout status. It only applies to Azure.

backupStorageLocation.description: Defining the properties for the backup Snapshot Location.

name.description: Specifies the name of the cloud provider used to store backups, such as aws, gcp, or azure.

bucket.description: Specifies the storage bucket where backups are uploaded.

prefix.description: Specifies the directory inside a storage bucket where backups are located.

region.description: Provides the region in which the bucket is created. It only applies to AWS. See the full list of AWS regions.

resourceGroup.description: Specifies the name of the resource group which contains the storage account for the backup storage location. It only applies to Azure.

storageAccount.description: Provides the name of the storage account for the backup storage location. It only applies to Azure.

credentials.description: Configuration of the credentials properties for velero component

useSecret.description: Specifies if a secret is required for IAM credentials. Set this to false when using kube2iam.

existingSecret.description: If specified and useSecret is true, uses an existing secret with this name instead of creating one.

secretContents.description: If specified and useSecret is true, provides the content for the credentials secret.
